author: Ian Talley
title: U.S. Sanctions Nine Individuals, Firms for Procuring Parts for Iranian Airlines
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The Treasury Department on Thursday imposed sanctions on nine individuals and firms accused of procuring jet engines and airplane parts for Iranian airlines previously blacklisted for their support of U.S.-designated terror groups.
The Trump administration is ramping up its broader Iran sanctions campaign, and Treasury officials say the action should send a message to other countries it is prepared to penalize anyone caught aiding Tehran.
... RELATED VIDEO Will Trump's Iran Bet Pay Off? After President Donald Trump's big gamble to pull the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear deal, the focus now shifts to Tehran, the Iranian people and America's allies. Gerald F. Seib explains the high stakes. Photo: Getty
